title: 'Pathetic Packaging'

title: 'The size mentioned in the website is 2 inches smaller'
body: 'I am having a shoulder of 44 inches hence I had bought the same but when it arrived it was smaller near the armpits and the biceps then I realised though it is written 44 they are tailoring it as a 42 my advice would be to take one size bigger when you are purchasing from this brand this review I am writing after exchanging the previous product'

title: 'I would be happy to write a positive review for a Blazer!'
body: The blazer I recently purchased is truly exceptional. The fit is perfect, the fabric is of high quality, and the attention to detail is evident in every stitch. It's a versatile piece that can be dressed up or down, and it always adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit.  One of the things I love most about this blazer is how comfortable it is. I can wear it for hours without feeling restricted or uncomfortable, which is a rare find in a jacket. The style is also timeless and classic, so I know it will be a staple in my wardrobe for years to come.
